titles.title: Referring the bill (H.R. 799), entitled "For the relief of Francisco Rivera and Alfonso Calderon", to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.
Referring the bill (H.R. 799), entitled "For the relief of Francisco Rivera and Alfonso Calderon", to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

bill.summary: Refers a specified private relief bill to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims with instructions for a report back to the House of Representatives.
